V03vinv16_u:9_0: tato mahānāmā śākyo dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato 'ntike prasādajātaḥ svagṛhaṃ gataḥ kathayati:

V03vinv16_u:9_3: āryaputra, kim etat? sa kathayati: adya bhagavatā anekaśatāyāḥ parṣadaḥ purastād īdṛśī dharmo deśito yaṃ śrutvānekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ iti;

V03vinv16_u:9_8: gacchata yūyam api, bhagavato 'ntikād dharmaṃ śṛṇuta;

V03vinv16_u:9_13: gacchāmi, devaṃ prabodhayāmi iti; punaḥ saṃlakṣayati: duḥkhaṃ svadārāṇām arthāya devo vijñāpyate;

V03vinv16_u:9_20: tataḥ tāḥ śākyāyinyāḥ anyāś ca yena mahāprajāvatī gautamī tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;

V03vinv16_u:9_31: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavato 'ntikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti āniñjyamānair indriyair iti;

V03vinv16_u:12_0: tato mahāprajāvatī gautamī pañcabhiḥ śākyānīśataiḥ parivṛtā nyagrodhārāmaṃ gatā bhagavataḥ sakāśād dharmaṃ śrotum;
V03vinv16_u:12_1: yāvan mahānāṃnaḥ śākyasya patnī sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitayā sārdhaṃ gatā;
V03vinv16_u:12_2: rūpayauvanavatī sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā ca avītarāgamanāṃsy ākṣeptum ārabdhā;
V03vinv16_u:12_3: sā āyuśmatā ānandena dṛṣṭā uktā ca:
V03vinv16_u:12_4: bhagini, tvaṃ tāvat prakṛtyaivābhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā;
V03vinv16_u:12_6: na śobhanaṃ tvayā kṛtaṃ yad alaṃkāraṃ prāvṛtyāgatā;
V03vinv16_u:12_7: naite mahātmānaḥ [A_333a] sarva eva vītarāgāḥ iti;
V03vinv16_u:12_8: sā evam uktā lajjāparigatahṛdayā avāṅmukhī ekānte 'pakramya tam alaṃkāram apanīya cintāparā vyavasthitā;
V03vinv16_u:12_11: sā tayāhūya uktā: gaccha rohike idam alaṃkāraṃ sthāpayitvā āgaccha iti;
V03vinv16_u:12_13: tato mahāprajāvatī gautamī pañcaśataparivārā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇā;
V03vinv16_u:12_15: yāvad anyatarā śākyakumārikā tasmin dharme deśyamāne karṇāvasaktaṃ muktāhāraṃ muhur ḥmuhuḥḥ prekṣate,
V03vinv16_u:12_16: pāninā ca parāmṛśati; tato bhagavān anityatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:12_17: tathāpi sā nāvatiṣṭhate, prekṣate eva muktāhāram; adrākṣīn mahānāmno 'gramahiṣī tāṃ śākyakumārikāṃ karṇāvasaktaṃ muktāhāre muhur muhuḥ prekṣamāṇām;
V03vinv16_u:12_18: dṛṣṭvā ca punar asyā etad abhavat:
V03vinv16_u:12_19: kim iyaṃ tapasvinī evam anityeṣu saṃskāreṣu deśyamāneṣu muktāhāre 'tyarthaṃ adhyavasitā muhur muhuḥ prekṣate;
V03vinv16_u:12_20: yadi madīyaṃ muktāhāraṃ paśyet sarvamadā asyā vigaccheyuḥ iti viditvā preṣyadārikāṃ rohikām āmantrayate:
V03vinv16_u:12_21: gaccha madīyaṃ muktāhāraṃ śīghram ānaya iti;
V03vinv16_u:12_23: hā kaṣṭam mamedṛśe dharme deśyamāne svāminyā ājñā dattā:
V03vinv16_u:12_24: dharmāntarāyo jātaḥ, sarvathā kaṣṭo dāsabhāvaḥ iti viditvā duḥkhadaurmanasyāhatā:
V03vinv16_u:12_27: draṣṭuṃ hi yā jinamukhaṃ na labhe 'dya pādaṃ
V03vinv16_u:12_28: śrotuṃ ca dharmam amalam sugatasya tasya //
V03vinv16_u:12_29: iti; atha bhagavata etad abhavat: iyaṃ rohikā dārikā pūrvabuddheṣu kṛtādhikārikā kiṃ tv alpāyuskā;
V03vinv16_u:12_30: uddhartavyā iyaṃ saṃsāracārakād iti viditvā ṛddhyā gāthaṃ bhūrjapatre ālikhya dattavān
V03vinv16_u:12_31: utpannasya vināśaṃ hi jñātvā kālyāṇi janmani /
V03vinv16_u:12_32: yatnam āsthāya kalyāṇaṃ śrotavyaṃ mama bhāṣitam //
V03vinv16_u:12_33: iti; atha rohikā dārikā hṛṣṭā tuṣṭā prītisaumanasyajātā gāthāṃ bhāṣate;

V03vinv16_u:14_0: The story of Muktikā, the daughter of King of Siṃhala, and the portrait of the Buddha
V03vinv16_u:15_1: yam eva divasaṃ pratisaṃdhir gṛhītas tam eva divasaṃ muktāvarṣaṃ patitam;
V03vinv16_u:15_3: te ūcuḥ: deva, asya satvasyānubhāvo yo 'yaṃ devyāḥ kukṣāv upapannaḥ iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_4_0: yāvad asāv upasthīyate śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair
V03vinv16_u:15_4_1: āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyais
V03vinv16_u:15_4_3: apsarā iva nandanavanavicāriṇī mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantī adharāṃ bhūmiṃ,
V03vinv16_u:15_5: na cāsyā kiṃcid amanojñāṃ śabdaśravaṇam yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya;
V03vinv16_u:15_6: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv16_u:15_8: yam api divasaṃ jātā tam api divasaṃ muktāvarṣaṃ patitam;
V03vinv16_u:15_9: rājā saṃlakṣayati: yadi dārakāyā anubhāvān muktāvarṣaṃ nipatitam asyā eva muktā bhavantu iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_11: tataḥ trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyṃ vyavasthāpyate:
V03vinv16_u:15_13: amātyā kathayanti: yasmād asyāḥ puṇyānubhāvena muktāvarṣaṃ patitaṃ tasmād bhavatu dārikāyā muktā iti nāma iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_16: dvābhyam aṃsadhātrībhyām, dvābhyaṃ kṣīradhātrībhyām, dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyām, dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikādhātrībhyam;
V03vinv16_u:15_17: sā aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣireṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv16_u:15_18: yasā mahatī saṃvṛttā tadā svakulavaṃśānurūpeṇācāravihāreṇa sāntarjanasya rājñaḥ atyarthaṃ bahumatā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv16_u:15_19: yāvad apareṇa samayena śrāvasteyā vaṇijaḥ sāmudraṃ yānapātraṃ pratipādya mahāsamudram avatīrṇā dhanahārakāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_21: tato bhāṇḍaṃ pratiśāmya rājakulasya nātidūre āvasitāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_22: te rātryāḥ pratyuṣasamaye udānān pārāyaṇān satyadṛśaḥ sthaviragāthāḥ sthavirīgāthāḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi vistareṇa svādhyāyitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_24: tatas tayā rājñe niveditam: deva, madhyadeśābhyāgatā vaṇijaḥ śobhanam gāyante iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_25: rājñā amātyānām ājñā dattā: bhavanta āhūyatāṃ gāyanakāḥ iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_26: te āhūyata; muktikā kathatati: gāyantu bhavantaḥ, śṛṇumaḥ kīdṛśaṃ madhyadeśe gāndharvam iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_27: te kathayanti: devi, na vayaṃ gāndharvikāḥ, vaṇijo vayaṃ śrāvasteyā vāyuvaśād ihāgatāḥ,
V03vinv16_u:15_28: asmābhi rātryāḥ pratyuṣasamaye budddhavacanaṃ paṭhitam iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_29: muktikayā buddha iti aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny āhṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv16_u:15_30: sā kutūhalajātā pṛcchati: bhavantaḥ ko 'yaṃ buddho nāma iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_32: devi, śākyānaṃ kumāra utpannaḥ anuhimatpārśve [Adhik-v_65] nadyā bhagīrathyās tīre kapilasya ṛṣer āśramapadasya nātidūre;
V03vinv16_u:15_34: saced gṛhī āgāram adhyāvatsyati rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī cāturantāṃ vijetā dharmiko dharmarājā saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_35: tasya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi saptaratnāni bhaviṣyanti tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ [A_334a] aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ ḥgṛhapatiratnaṃḥ pariṇāyakaratnam eva saptamam;
V03vinv16_u:15_36: pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām;
V03vinv16_u:15_37: sa imām eva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīm akhilām akaṇṭakām anutpātām adaṇḍenāśastreṇa dharmeṇa samenābhinirjityādhyāvatsyati;
V03vinv16_u:15_38: sacet keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyati tathāgato bhaviṣyaty arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vighuṣṭaśabdo loke;
V03vinv16_u:15_39: sa eva buddho nāma iti; muktikā kathayati: yadā yuṣmākaṃ gamanadeśakālas tadā mama nivedayiṣyatha;
V03vinv16_u:15_40: te kathayanti: evaṃ devi bhavatu, nivedayiṣyāmaḥ; yāvat teṣāṃ gamanadeśakālaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_46: iti; atha te vaṇijas taṃ lekham ādāyānupūrveṇa śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_48: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvāikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_50: siṃhaladvīpe bhadanta siṃhalarājño duhitayā bhagavataḥ ayaṃ lekho 'nupreṣitaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_51: bhagavatā muktikāyā vinayakālaṃ jñātvā svayam eva gṛhītvā vācitaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_52: vācayitvā kathayati: yadā yuṣmākaṃ punar gamanaṃ bhavati tadā mamāvedayiṣyatha;
V03vinv16_u:15_53: evaṃ bhadanta iti te vaṇijo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_54: tataḥ paṇyaṃ vikrīya pratipaṇyam ādāya bhagavatsākāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_55: kathayanti: bhagavan vayaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ ājñāṃ prayaccha iti kim asmābhir muktikā vaktavyā iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_56: bhagavān āha: suparikarmakṛtaṃ paṭam ānayata citrakarāṃś ca iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_60: na śaknuvanti bhagavataś citrakarā anekapuṇyaśatanirjātaṃ tathāgatapratibimbakam abhinirvartitum;
V03vinv16_u:15_61: bhagavān āha: upanāmayata pāṭam, prabhām utsṛjāmi iti; taiḥ paṭa upanāmitaḥ, bhagavatā prabhā utsṛṣṭā; citrakarair nānāraṅgaiḥ pūritā;
V03vinv16_u:15_62: tato bhagavatā pratimāyā adhastāt trīṇi śaraṇagamanāni pañca śikṣāpadāni dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ amulomapratilomaḥ āryāṣṭāṅgaś ca mārgo likhitaḥ,
V03vinv16_u:15_64: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
V03vinv16_u:15_68: mayā muktikāyāḥ paṭe abhilikhitaṃ prābhṛtam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv16_u:15_69: tvayā vistīrṇāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe siṃhaladvīpanivāsinaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃnipatya mahatā satkāreṇāyaṃ [A_334b] paṭa udghāṭayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_70: te ca vaṇijaḥ saṃdiṣṭāḥ; yadi muktikā pṛcchati kim idam iti vaktavyā ayaṃ tasya bhagavato rūpakāya iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_71: yadi pṛcchati; idam adhastāt kim idam iti vaktavyā:
V03vinv16_u:15_72: imāni trīṇi śaraṇagamanāni pañca śikṣāpadāni anulomapratilomaḥ pratītyasamutpādo jagataḥ pravṛttir ḥnivṛttiś caḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_74: yadi kathayati: idam upariṣṭāt kim idam iti vaktavyā:
V03vinv16_u:15_75: utsāhaya, śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītvā imam anulomapratilomaṃ dvādaśāṅgapratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokya vīryam ārabhate;
V03vinv16_u:15_76: sa amṛtādhigamaṃ mārgam avāpya sarvaduḥkhād vimucyate iti;
V03vinv16_u:15_77: evaṃ bhadanta iti te vaṇijo bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:15_78: tataḥ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanāḥ siṃhaladvīpagamanīyaṃ paṇyam ādāya anupūrveṇa siṃhaladvīpam anuprāptāḥ;

V03vinv16_u:60_0: śuddhakaṃ saṃmukham; kim atra saṃmukham? trīṇi saṃmukhāni:
V03vinv16_u:60_1: saṃghasaṃmukham, pudgalasaṃmukham, dharmasaṃmukhaṃ ca; saṃghasaṃmukhaṃ katamat? yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sīmāprāptāḥ kriyāprāptās te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:60_3: samavahitāś ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃukhībhūtā na prativahanti na pratikrośanti;
V03vinv16_u:60_4: yeṣāṃ prativahatāṃ pratikrośatāṃ pratikrośo ārohati ḥkarmāṇi ca kurvantiḥ idam ucyate saṃghasaṃmukham;
V03vinv16_u:60_5: [Adhik-v_83] pudgalasaṃmukhaṃ katamat? ye tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti yeṣāṃ ca tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati te sarve samavahitā bhavanti saṃmukhībhūtā;
V03vinv16_u:60_7_0: dharmasaṃmukhaṃ katamat? yena dharmeṇa yena vinayena ḥyenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ
V03vinv16_u:60_7_1: vyupaśāmyati tena dharmeṇa tena vinayena ḥtenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti,
V03vinv16_u:60_8: idam ucyate dharmasaṃmukham; [A_340a] sacet saṃghaḥ na śaknoti tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayituṃ tataḥ ḥpaścātḥ saṃghena vyūḍhakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃmantavyāḥ daśa vā pañca vā;
V03vinv16_u:60_9: evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃmantavyāḥ: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭhavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite pūrvaṃ tāvad utsāhayitavyāḥ:
V03vinv16_u:60_10: utsahadhve yūyaṃ buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ santo bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitum iti;
V03vinv16_u:60_11: saced utsahante tair vaktavyam utsahayāma iti;
V03vinv16_u:60_12: tataḥ paścād ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyaṃ:
V03vinv16_u:60_13: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ime buddharakṣitadharmaḥdattaḥsaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ utsahante bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
V03vinv16_u:60_14: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣameta anujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṅgho buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenān vyūḍhakān saṃmanyeta;
V03vinv16_u:60_15: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasasenā vyūḍhakā utsahante saṃghasya bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
V03vinv16_u:60_16: eṣā jñaptiḥ, tataḥ karma kartavyam; śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ime buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakā utsahante bahiḥ sīkmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
V03vinv16_u:60_18: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenāḥ vyūḍhakā bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayiṣyanti;
V03vinv16_u:60_19: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenān vyūḍhakān saṃmantum:
V03vinv16_u:60_20: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ bahiḥ simāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādikaraṇāni
V03vinv16_u:60_21: vyupaśamayiṣyanti, te tūṣṇīm; na kṣamate, bhāṣantām; saṃmatā saṃghena buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:60_22: (Adhik-v 84 te ca bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayiṣyanti;
V03vinv16_u:60_24: evam etad dhārayāmi vyūḍhakais tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitavam dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;

V03vinv16_u:62_12: adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ;

V03vinv16_u:62_27: tat saṃgha evaṃnāmānam adhikaraṇasaṃcārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ saṃmanyeta evaṃnāmā adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣuḥ saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ saṃcārayiṣyati;
V03vinv16_u:62_28: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate evaṃnāmānam adhikaraṇasaṃcārakaṃ bhikṣum saṃmantum,

V03vinv16_u:107_11: tataḥ āyuṣmān kālo mṛgāraputraḥ ḥsnātvāḥ tāny eva madīyāni cīvarāṇi ḥitiḥ kṛtvā tasya bhikṣoḥ santakāni cīvarāṇi prāvṛtya prakrāntaḥ;

V03vinv16_u:107_13: sa bhikṣūn praṣṭum ārabdhaḥ: āyuṣmantaḥ, kena madīyāni cīvarāṇi apahṛtāni? yāvat tasmin pradeśe āyuṣmataḥ kālasya mṛgāraputrasya sārdhaṃvihārī sthitaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:107_14: tena śrutam; sa kathayati: āyuṣmatā [Adhik-v_103] upādhyāyenāsmin pradeśe cīvarakāṇi sthāpitāni;

V03vinv16_u:107_19: putra mama santakāni, kasyānyasya santakāni? upādhyāya amukena bhikṣuṇā tasminn eva pradeśe cīvarakāṇi sthāpitāni;

V03vinv16_u:107_23: āyuṣmann imāni tāni cīvarāny upādhyāyena vyatyāsena nītāni;
V03vinv16_u:107_24: sa kathayati: pārājikām evāpattim apannaḥ steyacittena tena nītāni;

V03vinv16_u:107_35: bhagavān āha: tiṣṭha bhikṣu ahaṃ tvāṃ dharmeṇa ḥosārayāmi;
V03vinv16_u:107_38: na śobhanam asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ yat kālasya bhikṣor adūṣiṇo 'napakāriṇo balād utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kṛtam iti;
V03vinv16_u:107_39: te samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:107_40: tair antarmārgair bhikṣur dṛṣṭa uktaś ca,

V03vinv16_u:107_52: śrutam asmābhir bhadanta bhikṣoḥ sakāśād antarmārgeṇa osāritaṃ bhagavatā yaduta dharmeṇa iti;

V03vinv16_u:116_0: kathaṃ ca bhikṣavas tatsvabhāvaiṣīya adhikaraṇaśamatho bhavati? kathaṃ ca punar
V03vinv16_u:116_1: ihaikeṣām adhikaraṇānāṃ damaś ca bhavati śamaś ca vyupaśamaś ca yaduta tatsvabhāvaiṣīyena adhikaraṇaśamathena? iha hastako bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye āpattim avajānāti;
V03vinv16_u:116_2: avajñāya pratijānāti, pratijñāya punar apy ajānāti;
V03vinv16_u:116_4: bhagavān āha: dadata yūyaṃ bhikṣavo hastakasya bhikṣoḥ tatsvabhāviṣīyam iti yo vā punar anyo 'py evaṃjātīyaḥ evaṃ ca punar dātavyaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:116_5_0: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭhavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe
V03vinv16_u:116_5_1: saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite ḥhastakena bhikṣuṇā ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yathāvṛddhikayā
V03vinv16_u:116_5_2: sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā utkuṭukena sthitvā idaṃ syād vacanīyam:
V03vinv16_u:116_6: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgho, mayā hastakena bhikṣuṇā saṃghamadhye āpattir avajñātaḥ,
V03vinv16_u:116_7: avajñāya pratijñātaḥ, pratijñāya punar apy avajñātaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:116_9: dadatu bhadantāḥ saṃgho me hastakasya bhikṣos tatsvabhāvaiṣīyam anukampām upādāya;
V03vinv16_u:116_10: evaṃ dvir apy evaṃ trir api; tataḥ paścād ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam;
V03vinv16_u:116_11: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ, ayaṃ hastako bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye āpattim avajānāti avajñāya pratijānāti [Adhik-v_107] pratijñāya punar apy avajānāti;
V03vinv16_u:116_12: ḥayaṃ hastako bhikṣuḥ saṃghāt tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ yācate;
V03vinv16_u:116_13: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghaḥ hastakasya bhikṣoḥ tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ dadyād ity eṣā jñaptiḥ;
V03vinv16_u:116_14: karma kartavyam; śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ, so 'yaṃ hastako bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye āpattim avajānāti,
V03vinv16_u:116_15: avajñāya pratijānāti, pratijñāya punar apy avajānātiḥ;
V03vinv16_u:116_16: tat saṃgho hastakasya bhikṣos tatsvabhavaiṣīyaṃ dadāti;
V03vinv16_u:116_17: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate hastakasya bhikṣos tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ dātuṃ te tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv16_u:116_18: na kṣamate bhāṣantām; iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā; ḥevaṃḥ dvitīyā ḥtīrīyāḥ karmavācanā ḥkartavyāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:116_22: tatsvabhāvaiṣīyadattakena bhikṣuṇā na pravrājayitavyaṃ nopasaṃpādayitavyaṃ na niśrayo deyo na śramaṇoddeśa upasthāpayitavyaḥ nānena karma kartavyam,
V03vinv16_u:116_27: nānena bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyaḥ śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā;
V03vinv16_u:116_29: na poṣadhe, na pravāraṇe, na jñaptidvitīye na jñapticaturthe karmaṇi;
V03vinv16_u:116_30: nāpi saṃghamadhye vinayo moktavyaḥ satsv anyeṣu vinayadhareṣu pudgaleṣu;
V03vinv16_u:116_31: tatsvabhāvaiṣīyadattako bhikṣur yathāprajñaptān āsamudācārikān dharmān asamādāya vartate,
V03vinv16_u:116_33: ekaṃ dhārmikam; ekam adhārmikam katamat? yathāpitat hastako bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye āpattiṃ pratijānāti pratijñāya avajānāti avajñāya punar api pratijānāti,
V03vinv16_u:116_34: tasya saṃghaḥ svabhāvaiṣīyaṃ dadāti adhārmikaṃ tatsvabhāvaiṣīyadānam;

V03vinv16_u:119_38: ḥ yasmin tu catvāro bhikṣavaḥ prativasanti uttare vā tatra kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaś ca;
